opinion:
544 U.S. 968

ATTICA CENTRAL SCHOOLS
v.
J. S., BY HIS PARENT AND NATURAL GUARDIAN, N. S., ET AL.

No. 04-899.

Supreme Court of United States.

1

C. A. 2d Cir. Motion of National School Boards Association et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Certiorari denied. Reported below: 386 F. 3d 107.
